description:
Elsword is an ambitious but hot-headed young swordsman. He was trained by the commander of the Crimson Knights—his older sister—http://anidb.net/ch87461 [Elesis]. As a swordsman, he is capable of executing swift attacks with one hand or strong blows with two. He uses his great sword and his basic fire abilities to eliminate his foes.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Elsword
